entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle early this evening and then to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight.
